greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = -2*a(n-1) + 4*a(n-2), a(0)=1, a(1)=2.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,4)
formula: a(n) = -(-2)^n*F(n-2) for n >= 0, with F = A000045, and F(-1) = 1, F(-2) = -1. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 08 2018
program: (PARI) vector(50, n, n--; (-1)^(n+1)*2^n*fibonacci(n-2)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 08 2018
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Aug 25 2003
